title: Moon Car Rental
description: A full-stack car rental application, implementing car browsing, car booking, and booking management.

title: Starry Lottery Platform
description: A distributed microservices-based online lottery platform based on Spring Boot, implementing user tag filtering, lottery event configuration, and prize distribution.

title: Moon Ordering
description: An online ordering system based on Spring Boot, featuring transactions, order management, shopping cart, employee management, statistics report exports, etc.
